title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\UptimeCheckConfig_HttpCheck_BasicAuthentication
name: UptimeCheckConfig_HttpCheck_BasicAuthentication
description:
A type of authentication to perform against the specified resource or URL that uses username and password.

Currently, only Basic authentication is supported in Uptime Monitoring.

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.UptimeCheckConfig.HttpCheck.BasicAuthentication
